title: Spectacular Slovakia #5: Where is the princess and the dragon?
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary: Autumn is a great time to explore the Small Carpathians. Naomi Hužovičová, a Canadian who has lived in Slovakia for 14 years, tells you why a trip to Smolenice at this time of year is a good idea. Did you know that this small town, along with its iconic castle, has a remarkable Iron Age settlement to visit?
itunes:subtitle: Autumn is a great time to explore the Small Carpa…
description: Autumn is a great time to explore the Small Carpathians. Naomi Hužovičová, a Canadian who has lived in Slovakia for 14 years, tells you why a trip to Smolenice at this time of year is a good idea. Did you know that this small town, along with its iconic castle, has a remarkable Iron Age settlement to visit?
